content: Works really well. Clear instructions.
It only takes a minute to report on this app.
Very efficient

This is a fantastic health monitoring app in the current Covid 19 Crisis and because it has localised data gives users an understanding of what is happening in your area. The weekly reports are great and they influence decisions made by Sage due to the large data set.
Simple
Brilliant app which has improved loads over the last few weeks, everyone should use it
Useful app in uncertain times together with the track and trace app I get up to date information while providing information that could help others.
Informative and useful app.
Simple and straightforward
Would recommend everyone to sign up for this
Quick simple and good feedback. Feel as though I'm contributing and getting factual feedback. Unlike the NHS app
Hopefully this app may help in the fight against covid 19
Excellent,easy to use app.
Very easy to use. Only my second day but all good. No problems
Neat. Useful. Trusted
Very easy to use and very clear information given
Easy to use and anything to help beat Corona viruse
Good information and easy to use.
Very useful app for tracking the disease and be informed about research.
Easy to use, hope it helps the research
Very easy to do and only takes a minute. No effort for potential benefits to overall population.
If it helps the fight against covid19 why not have this.
Simple to use.
Excellent tool. I hope it helps.
Good, worthwhile study. Some of the charts could be clearer
Simple and fast check for Covid 19 areas and numbers of people showing symptoms giving vital data to keep us safer.
Hoping to contribute to research. Easy to use
Simple method of reporting any symptoms with the aim of getting on top of this virus. Takes 30 seconds once a day so not exactly ruining your day to assist.
Everyone should have this app now
Ok for 2 weeks, then app terminally failed, just showing blank white screen. Had to reinstall it which is hard as it doesn't come up when searching Play Store.
Easy to use
Very useful Covid app
Really useful providing clear insights into what is happening in your local area.
Very clear and precise easy to understand
Very easy and quick to update each day. Worth doing to help.
Feel good helping fight Covid. Please join the 4 million users in UK. We need more of us to use this app
Rubbish! The app will not move past the test questions. Constantly asks for new test info. Cannot complete the process.I have uninstalled it, that is how I deal with apps that do not work!
Easy and useful
Easy to download and use. Links to really helpful up to date information about covid and good to help research.
Good app. Some good information on there. Surprising statistics. Should be more options for symptoms though. Have like the NHS old symptom tracker tick list style to how you feel that day.
Easy to be a part of the solution.
Doesn't take up much time and easy to use. It's good to see science take a lead.
IT SEEMS LIKE A WORTHY APP SO FAR Love the idea we are adding something for future research…ANYTHING TO GET THIS PANDEMIC UNDER CONTROL!
Easy to use and informative.

Used since the beginning, it felt good to be part of something that improved our understanding of the virus. Still remains a very necessary and relevant tool for keeping an eye on trends and regional risk. Download it now
Great app and does not track your location.
Very quick and easy to navigate
Easy to use.
Brilliant and really easy to use
Quietly, over time, collecting essential data to give us a chance against the covid-19 epidemic. Really impressive project - sign up now and do your bit.
I rated app 4 stars because I think it could be improved by including questions like:- Contact with non household members within the home? Other symptoms not on the list with space for Comments.
Must be useful to know where cases are developing.

Was working great, now I can't scroll through the covid tests to select the latest to give results, all you get is the first 3 tests.... I've had 16. Bit pointless having the test part of you can't add the result when you get it.
Works well
Very usefull
Excellent - quick and easy to use, and you really feel you are doing something to fight the virus. It also gives access to useful information.
Very easy to use and helps us all with tracking the virus. Also the weekly updates from the team help to get a clearer picture of what is going on.
Doing what I can to help gather data about this virus. Only takes 10secs each day to report on my health.
Something this thorough, and led by experts to help stop the spread gets 5 stars from me.
Easy to use, very informative and itsbhelpung the fight
Ok, but have to input the same info dob, height and weight eveytime.?
Really helpful to keep appraised
No problems experienced to date
So helpful
Easy to use and helping to understand the virus.
Failed to load yesterday. H ad to reinstall
Only takes seconds a day to help improve data on COVID
My hope is that it will help the scientists to fight Covid 19.
Good
Easy to use. Happy to participate in something that can help people.
Easy to use and very informative.
**** EDIT Now working again **** As many othere have reported I am getting the white screen on load. So the app is now useless. Please release an update to fix this
Easy to use and the information it provides is interesting and understandable.
Useful and informative.
I find the updates in my area reassuring for my wellbeing.
A valuable asset for getting a handle on the pandemic
Essential app for all.
Good app. Good for science.
It stopped working and I had to reinstall, otherwise does what it is supposed to do
Works fine and is presumably useful but the daily notifications stopped a couple of weeks ago so I have forgotten to use it.
Feels valuable.
Very easy to use and takes seconds to complete each day.
Informative and up to date
Very worthwhile
Very easy to use. Takes around a minute a day. Anything that can help with COVID is worth doing.

Bugs that mean you can't fill things out properly are frustrating. I spent a long time answering multiple questions it was a little unclear that I was supposed to be focusing on pre covid and that there would be a second set of questions but like many friends of mine when arriving at the questions to answer for during lockdown the software froze and I could only exit in the hope I could go back but unfortunately exiting meant I no longer had an option to finish the survey
Have been using this app for months with no problems. Easy to use but today I had to reinstall as faced with a white screen despite stopping the app. Only reason for losing a star.

There have just been a couple of hiccups with the App, one recovered after downloading again and the other after an email in relation to the problem. It is very easy to use and not intrusive. It gives very conclusive results throughout the country in conjunction with, and in advance of, government figures with a wealth of information on different aspects of the virus. It's quite reassuring compared with other broadcasts.
Very easy and quick to use. Help to fight Covid. Use this app.
OK
Excellent

It's fast and simple for users, which is good. Loss of smell and taste should be listed separately as my taste returned about a week before my smell even began to return. Edit: since getting a new mobile phone the notifications no longer work, so I don't get the daily reminders to contribute any more - so sometimes days go by and I'm so busy I forget to check in. My phone settings are set to accept Zoe notifications, so I don't know what the problem is??
Very easy to do and takes about 10 seconds to complete
Good information
Great app have used it since lockdown
Excellent app to help me stay safe and informed
Easy to use. Informative. Pleased it is providing useful information
Good 🙂
Straightforward to use
It's a useful and important role for the population to assist in managing the pandemic.
Very comprehensive survey and easy to use
Easy to use and takes little time plus you get up to date figures.

I'm self isolating because of age & have underlying health problems so protecting self & others & really frighten so aim not to get C19 & hope my diabetic foot ulcer will get better in coming months but don't anticipate it will be until after Xmas. So happy to participate & hope info helps with limiting Covid19

This is brilliant in terms of confirming Covid-19 position both nationally, by area and locally so you know the position re infections. The info is ahead of the government and independent. Interesting and relevant articles. Can't recommend highly enough.
Very worthwhile
Difficulty getting App to work for few days. Had to uninstall and then install again. Does not always seem to register the information I put in.
Easy and informative
Feels worth doing. Often slow to respond - probably depends on available memory? Not always intuitive eg how to enter further test results.
Well it crashed today, so I uninstalled and reinstalled and all fine. Easy to use and lots of background info.
Simple, important, independent, informative. In the best traditions of British academic excellence and public service.

Will not autorotate in Samsung galaxy A5 (2017). Unable to see whether the password you are typing in during registration is the one u want as the box is covered by the keyboard & page can't be scrolled upwards. In portrait mode (the only one allowed as it won't rotate to landscape), can not see the long sentence responses regarding PPE, so I don't know what I have selected.
Back to 5 stars, had a couple of days of the app not working but I notice it's been updated so all's good again. Doing my bit
Very easy to use.
Feel like we're doing our bit to help control the virus

This app makes me feel that I am doing my bit to help in the fight against coronavirus. However, I have not been able to load it for the last 3 days despite uninstalling and installing again. It has just sprung back to life though, so hopefully just a glitch.
The app is v easy to use, the daily reminder v helpful & it helps me to feel 'active' in the struggle re Covid.
Can't always move on to next question or page
Super app, but mine has crashed today and won't load any longer. It's worked well since March.
Very good but has not worked for 2 days. Have uninstalled and re installed Looks ok now
Cool

Does not always log the entries one makes - several times it has told me incorrectly that I have not replied for one or two days. No opportunity for making comments: I wanted to tell it that I had had antibody tests for research purposes (Biobank) but would not be told the results but could not do so - the only option was to record a "failed test".
Excellent app. Easy to use. Important weekly update from Tim Spector. I feel like I'm helping in a small way. I set a reminder on my calendar so I don't forget to report :)
Working again!
Have had antibody test as in novavax trial, but I won't be told it's result as trial is blinded. No way to record this.

Simple app, they seem to be adding new features as the situation progresses. Great initiative! Update: hasn't sent me a notification in at least a month now, so haven't logged my symptoms in all that time. Such a shame that erroneous technology can have such an impact :-(. Update: notifications work again \o/
Quick to use and easy to follow updates on numbers and research.
Hoping I'm helping but more options needed. If working in care some places are testing weekly, can this be an option other than testing at home or at hospital.
Get better information from this app than what comes out of government! Easy to use, but today it wouldn't open so had to uninstall and download it again. I think it's brilliant though.
Good app that gives a lot of information.
Very informative.
A few bugs but generally, the best covid measurement tool we've got. Full of good info as well.

Vital work. Fully support. Recently the weekly more detailed questions have not been asked. Why? Otherwise good. When my wife had a few days of dizziness the team organised tests for both of us. Both negative as we suspected. Keep up the good work.
Cool app recommend to my friends and sent link

This app was great, I could log all my tests (regular tests from work) but as of yesterday I've just been getting a white screen? Uninstalled and installed again but still the same..disappointing. Update: I can get back on again, but unable to scroll down my tests to update results :/
Can't seem to edit my last test result. Will only show me the past ones as it won't let me scroll down. I have done 11, only shows 10 though. Have to be tested once a week for work.
Does a great job keeps up to date
Informative
Firstly was 5stars. Down to three now as half my tests have disappeared off the app
Keeps me up to date with new findings and research data.
App will no longer open, just a white screen. Tried clearing cache, shutting down to no effect.
Easy to use app. Every little helps in this fight.
Was OK but, as with many other people, it now loads a white screen and nothing more.

I've been using this app trouble free for a few months now. However just recently the app will not load on my Samsung phone and all I'm getting is a white screen. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app but the problem persists. Any advice out there?
Brilliant app BUT for some reason it will no longer load my account. Just get a blank page. Tried reinstalling, and on different devices and it seems that it's my account! HELP!
Some benefit.
Easy use
Have been using for months, suddenly stopped loading. Have uninstalled and reinstalled but still get blank white screen.
Good until yesterday, now it will not open from the app

My partner has a problem with the app (which is up to date) on her Motorola phone. After only 3 reported tests the screen is not showing any more as the available space has been filled, it just shows the "Is this list correct" button at the bottom and the "Add new test" at the top of the list. It won't scroll to show the other tests she's added or the new one she just added and there's no way to reduce the font size to get more in. It's stressing her out HELP

I kept trying to check in but was given all the registration questions every day, not just the symptom check, which was really annoying. So I reinstalled the app, created a new account and it worked for one day, but now I can't even get into the app, just get a white screen. How is it so broken?
10000% better than the track and trace app
I've used it for weeks, now it will not go further than showing the logo, then blanc screen. Tried reinstall and restarts of phone.

Easy to use

Had a glitch the first time I downloaded the app, I had to keep entering the profile data each day. The second download seems to be working fine now.

Better than the NHS app
The most useful Covid-19 app together with the NHS one

Very important app. I want to give it 3.5 stars just because it asks me all of the initial questions again, every time I log in to update my health. Surely that's unnecessary?
Not sure if it's helping but doing it anyway.

Really impresswd with this app, particularly the way it has adapted and changed over the course of the pandemic. They've built on feedback and improved the user experience as time went on. It's great to be able to provide useful info to support the pandemic response, and to have info about local risk.
User friendly.

We have today received our test results and we are positive. If it wasn't for this app we wouldn't have been offered a test as quickly as we were. Fortunately our symptoms are milder more like a head cold. If more people knew about and used this app it would enable thousands more people to be tested.
The app has come on leaps and bounds since March. Congrats Developers..
Very easy to use and very informative information and statistics. Good also for local information.
Straight forward and easy to use.
Great app for finding the rate in your area
Very informative app. Keeps you up to date with what is happening with the nasty virus.
Great app
Quick and easy. Loads of feedback on results and analysis.
Also locked out. Cant even create a new account with an alternative email address. Long ago fixed
replyContent: Thank you for using our app and getting in touch! This is a not-for-profit initiative and the app was launched very recently, so please bear with us as we work to resolve any issues. A new app release is now live, please update your app, reset your password and let us know if this resolves your issue. We appreciate your support to #slowthespread.

content: Useful daily tool for keeping awareness of local and national figures as well as the latest scientific news in trying to combat the virus.
Easy to use, kinda glitchy sometimes
This is a great study. I feel its important to know how this disease progresses, so it can be treated
Very informative
Clear and precise data seeking Easy to use
Excellent app - sign up to help the Kings Scientists track covid-19
Easy to complete but could do with a reminder
Great app. Everyone should have it!
OK
Great
They need this to study the disease, and it is super easy!!! Download it, and help the science/medical community learn. Also, there are no ads, and they guarantee data privacy.
Useful
Easy to use!

An extremely worthwhile venture to join. It engenders a sense of hope and positive contribution by each person involved to our present and future understanding of covid-19 in a time of great concern and uncertainties.
repeating the same profile questions is a bit of a bore.
Easy to use but some questions are repeated although they do not change
When trying to report my daily health, it asks me to enter all my details again despite doing this on registration.
Just takes a short time to update every day. It's good to contribute to such a useful tool during this pandemic..
Simple & Easy
All round excellent
Provides a wealth of information and simple to navigate

I downloaded this yesterday and completed a profile. Today I have to fill in the same details again...I was 5ft 5" and female yesterday, that hasn't changed overnight! I t all seems a bit cumbersome at present

easy to use. providing useful data to researchers.

Quick and easy to use.

Great app
Easy to take and glad I'm participating

I haven't had ANY reminders since installing this app last week, even though they're turned on. I'm not alone: housemates report erratic reminders recently too. This is a shame as I often forget to report without reminders & so your research suffers. I wonder if the app is programmed to start in the background or not? (Android 10 on Huawei P30 lite (with full Google services))
Easy to log in and reply and log out

It is great. Although I would like some background information to need to be repeated. But maybe it is fine.
So easy

Good

Fine

Very easy to follow. Slight difficulty in always managing to find the entry icon. Can't always remember to complete the daily input!! My old mobile broke and it has taken me more than 1hr to login/create new acc on new one. I went round and round the loop and tried forgetting my old PWD, but nothing helped, eventually I used the old PWD and was successful. Dear-oh-Dear.
Very god app map is helpful to understand estimated spread of virus daily
Fine

App works well. It's good to contribute to a research study like this. I wish they could log my answers to save me filling out the same info every time. It only takes a minute per day though so not a big deal.
Easy and essential

Going thru same q's ever day is a bit pointless if nothing has changed. Ask q at start "has anything changed since last survey?" If not go to end. Carry on with yr day.

Keeps wiping the data that I put in for other family members but works fine for my profile.
Easy to use.
Simple to use and benefits everyone

It also doesn't appear on the Play Store when searching for the app though it can be found by clicking the link on the developers website. Other than that, it is a really worthwhile app & the links give very useful stats.
It only takes a few seconds to report and is very easy to set up and use.
Great idea, but clunky to operate
Easy to use
I think this is a really important app and urge everyone to use it. I have had to uninstall and reinstall twice which is frustrating but still want to be part of the study, so worth it

Easy to use and a very useful tool for assessing the progress of the pandemic without relying on government figures.
App is useful and I know it helps but it doesn't save my information e.g. height, weight so I have to type that in every day.
Easy to use apart from some of the vacuous questions eg. "How many times have you been outside your house?". Does that include your garden?
Varies in efficiency. Sometimes cannot get in to record daily health. Now totally stuck. Have had to reinstall it.

Easy to use and hopefully helping to show where the virus infections are high and if they are spreading. Takes a second to complete and reliable data.

It's easy to use and you know you are proactively doing something to help
A simple procedure that takes seconds to answer but may give millions of minutes to your life.

Not accurate. I live in an area which has had really low numbers but this app is identifying my area as 5000+ a month. In reality <800 in total since the start of the pandemic. I have now deleted my data and will uninstall.

Great app

Fab

I hope that more people keep downloading this app and using it daily. It's been shown to track changes in numbers getting Covid more quickly than the ONS official statistics, which would help in dealing with outbreaks if the government would institute a proper,locally managed, test, track and isolate system. It only takes a few seconds a day to report your (hopefully lack of) symptoms. Very easy to use, and gives access to the latest information. However, the app no longer shows up in the App Store if you search by its full name. I can now only find it by searching for "symptom tracker" or even "zoe", without the word "covid". Very strange! I hope that Google and Zoe can soon rectify this.
Quick and simple to use
Easy to use works well so far.
Thank you to the developers and Prof Tim Spector. Testing and the government have failed us again. It's great to have such high quality information coming through from Zoe.
Clear and unintrusive

Ability to check my own history. As I battle with suspected long covid, being able to look back at my daily history would be extremely helpful. Or give my GP access so they can see it.

replyContent: Thank you for using our app and getting in touch! This is a not-for-profit initiative and the app was launched very recently, so please bear with us as we work to resolve any issues. A new app release is now live, please update your app and let us know if this resolves your issue. We appreciate your continued support to #slowthespread.

replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We are not currently able to collect information on behalf of others however, we are working on this. As we are a small, not for profit team we appreciate your patience. Please update your app and keep checking here for new releases. We appreciate your continued support to #slowthespread.

Also can't possibly provide useful results if it can't even distinguish between a posive antibody test and a positive Covid test. The whole app also feels like it wastes my time. It has never once provided me with any useful information in exchange for my inputting my information daily.
Helps a lot day to day to keep track of how I'm feeling. I was feeling really bad a few days in a row, told me to go get a test, even gave me places I could go. I did. Results should be here today.
